showFailurePopUp() - Method in class com.example.wordhunt.mainGrid
if the player fails to find any valid word, it will show a pop up window for 3 seconds
showPauseWindow() - Method in class com.example.wordhunt.mainGrid
if the player press the back button when the game is running, a pop up window will be opened and the timer will be paused
showSuccessPopUp(String) - Method in class com.example.wordhunt.mainGrid
if the player succeeds to find a valid word within the given time, he/she will gain the score same as the length of the word and a pop up window will be opened containing the definition of that word
